main event: An object was reported hovering and disappearing over White Wood, South Dakota on July 5, 1954.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for about 2 hours., The object was reported as moving very fast and erratic., A scramble was ordered but fighter pilots could not make contact with the object., The object was observed using field glasses., The object appeared to hover like a star.
sighted object: one huge object in the sky
witness description: general public and possibly military personnel
